replies.body: Hi there yeah so uh i'm still waiting on that back to the future themed skin for Zilean and Ekko .-. soooo yeah.
CHRONOSQUAD https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7eL5kj5FE4E
why did {{champion:120}} get this skin, and not someone WITH AN ACTUAL LANCE ({{champion:59}})?

Riot loves to miss the mark with great skin ideas.  Remember how long it took them to give Bloodmoon to {{champion:131}} ? When she literally shoulda been the first one.   And Omega Squad to veigar, instead of {{champion:115}} .  He throws bombs all day and already has a crazy personality
The last blood moon event was at the exact same time as the {{champion:19}}  rework.  Talk about a missed skin.
more interested as to why no warring kingdoms hecarim....especially back at year of the horse o.0 {{champion:120}} {{item:3070}}
logged in to upvote this VERY VALID POINT RIOT
actually that would be a pretty cool duo skin idea and kinda a shout out to the creators of chronosquad
We have PROJECT: Ekko, he doesn't need another futuristic skin. Maybe PROJECT: Zilean would be cool?
I think you read his post wrong, Marty.

You guys should know that Hextech loot skin is worth 2450 RP, do you guys think garbage like this or pax sivir trash with No animation, abilities or whatever worth this amount of RP ??
we as players community should take a stand and Not buy anything riot throws at us, if they lose profit from in a certain department they'll change their methods. loot is gambling and lately they are throwing trash stuff to make them seem unique.
Real question time though, do you really want a really good skin with all those things locked away forever like pax sivir or locked behind hecxtech loot?
Locked away forever if it spares me going through what I've witnessed this season again.

well want to know why they don't do that?

A: the skins being rare is its own value.

B: Riot wouldnt want to make high quality skins and not sell them to the highest amount of people, (Legendary and up are too expensive to make to not sell normally)

C: The people that disagree with this point are more plentiful than the people that do.
if you dont like the skin in the first place then why tf are you complaining about the rarity

The guy never mentioned anything about rarity you blind noob ! are you stupid or something  ?!
who gives a fuk about rarity, every old skin will make a come back in a different way...get used to it ! The fact a skin is locked behind 10 is silly, as it's meant for spoiled btches like you.
well said! no idea where this blind weirdo read i mentioned rarity ! plus...I already have pax sivir lol. this doesn't mean it's fair for other players who don't have it.

Not worth the 10 gems, at most 5 gems in it's finest day, Riot should stop this "10 gems tag price" crap, and start considering 3, 5, 7, and 10 gems worth of skins ! Like skin in the shop vary in it's price, it should be the same in loot. You can't equal this garbage with hextech annie.
Another garbage skin...Pax sivir is an example of a 520 RP worth skin with no ability or animation skin or anything, that should only worth 3 gems at most.
It seems like a 975 skin, or even 1350.
It does cost 10 gems for these skins, but to be fair the gems are free they are just random drops in a chest.
Free ?? LMFAO, ya... gems come like key fragments, sometimes even more, LMFAO !!

My luck with Gemstones is awesome, but these skins are worth barely 975RP. 
No sound/voice changes, MAYBE a single animation change, some particle changes. 
I'd like it if the hardest to get skins were worth the time. While the skins do look good, they lack a whole lot of things needed for anyone to want to really go out and try to get these.
There's a back animation, so they had to get Billy to raise the price on the skin
Ive never hated on the skins department before but this is seriously weak in terms of its cost.

This skin was barely worth the intentional price of 1350RP, I still don't understand why they amped it up to a Loot-Exclusive, 10 gemstone skin.

He isn't even using the lance right...
he's made for halberd, or scythe-like weapons. lances arent made for swinging, its made for stabbing. what doesnt riot get!?{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

So as someone who owns DN Darius, and SS Vayne, I find this new skin completely lacking and not even worth a single gemstone tbh. I was already sitting on 10 gemstones when I heard that a new hextech skin was coming out and was hoping that me waiting for the new skin would be worth it rather than spending them on HT Annie. I'm also  currently sitting on 18 gemstones right now. However, even with this amount stockpiled I really see no reason to spend any of them on skins that have no value to them other than to be collectible. Plus I loved that tidbit from awhile back about the SKT skins where you wanted them to be so much better and you blew away my expectations for them, which is why I own 3/6 of them currently. Sadly, now that you spent so much effort on a set of skins I guess you gave up on making other skins worth their prices now.
But why isn't this just a legendary Hecarim skin? What's so special about it?
it looks identical to the warden skin collection. . .
So could this not have just been the next Victorious skin?
Even Riot knows this skin is lacking, the video completely avoids the fact that there are no lancing animations.
maybe he's just 'horsing' around xD
Can these 10 dollar skins just be available for 10 dollars?
this should just be a 1350 skin. i mean its really nice and i want it but this 10 gems stuff is crap. its way too expensive when you can just sell it outright. I mean seriously!
They should have changed his Q animation to actually match what a lance does.

How does one actually get gemstones?  I got about 15-20 chests last year, and have a dozen or so this year, and have never received any gemstones.  Not sure what the point is in providing content that no one can obtain.
it's gambling don't fool yourself with this grabage

>
> My luck with Gemstones is awesome, but these skins are worth barely 750RP. 
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

All of them are at least 975 quality, not 750 or below.
Soulstealer Vayne is 975 RP. Hextech Annie and Dreadnova Darius can be easily 1350 RP skins.
Hence the "at least"

Gemstone skins are lame. Why make super cool skins that nobody can have. People who do mass unboxings dont even get these things.
That's exactly the point. Create some rarity so not everyone and their mothers can have all the ''rare'' skins
ty sir. i'm glad somebody else understands the system
when is the star guardian urgot?????????
The star guardian skins are supposed to mimic Sailor Moon....  and Urgot is male.  so never
lol but Ezreal gets a star Guardian skin? lol idiots
